title.rendered: Gottwals Books Gives Cash for Recent College Textbooks

content.rendered: We understand how frustrating it is to sell used college textbooks online or back to the school. Let us take care of it for you! Bring your recent college textbooks to any Gottwals Books location and receive cash!

excerpt.rendered: We understand how frustrating it is to sell used college textbooks online or back to the school. Let us take care of it for you! Bring your recent college textbooks to any Gottwals Books location and receive cash!
